item.title: How to grow your instagram following fast
item.description: Insta Gains Here are some tips to help you Design an approach that will result in maximum engagement and assist you in the pursuit to follower attainment Use hashtags Hashtags are a useful way of gaining followers without following others, Hashtags can increase your profile visibility to users on instagram.

item.title: Is tiktok a worthy marketing tool ?
item.description: Tiktok returns tiktok ia the new kid on the block and is quickly grabbing the public’s attention.

item.title: Marketing during covid 19
item.description: Is it time to implement different strategies ? here are some tips to apply to your marketing efforts during this recent pandemic Use the current situation to improve customer relations
